title: Tesla Offering $2B of Stock, Facebook Headed to Court
itunes:title: Tesla Offering $2B of Stock, Facebook Headed to Court
description:
Bloomberg News Tech Reporter Dana Hull discusses Tesla offering $2 billion of stock. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Sarah Frier talks about Facebook heading to court. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Features Editor Jeremy Keehn share their insight on P&G developing its next big thing. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Sridhar Natarajan explains how Goldman trader Beth Hammack is charting her way up the ranks of the firm’s all-male top tier. And we Drive to the Close with Jim Lowell, CIO of Adviser Investments.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
